issue.title: [Java] Allow loading/unloading vectors without using FieldNodes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-792](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-792). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The information stored in FieldNode structure is not strictly necessary for serializing/deserializing vectors. We should allow loading/unloading of vectors without it.
